org.dellroad.hl7.io
Class HL7FileWriter

java.lang.Object
  org.dellroad.hl7.io.HL7FileWriter
All Implemented Interfaces:
HL7Writer
public class HL7FileWriter
extends Object
implements HL7Writer

Writes out HL7 messages in "file format".

Each segment is terminated with LF, and a blank line is added between messages.
